main event: A luminous spherical shooting object was observed in Andahuaylas, Peru on 23 October 1957.
interesting points: The object was seen coming from the northeast and made a zig-zag motion before falling,The object was observed by one witness,There was a reported sighting of another unidentified flying object two weeks prior in the same region,This second object emitted red, green, and yellow lights and was seen over a mountainous area for about twenty minutes,The conclusion of the first sighting suggested it was a probable meteor.
